title: Basalt rock (mining)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Basalt rocks containing Basalt can be found in the Salt Mine under Weiss. Basalt rocks can be mined with a Mining level of 72 and higher.

Object ID33257

Basalt rocks containing Basalt can be found in the Salt Mine under Weiss. Basalt rocks can be mined with a Mining level of 72 and higher.

Mining Info[edit | edit source]

Rock
Level required 72
Mining XP5 xp
Required toolPickaxe
Respawn time5.4 seconds
Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
